proposals.title: Predict Rice Export Value Based on Production Data
proposals.problem_statement: Understanding the relationship between rice production and export values can help in forecasting future export revenues. This task aims to predict the export value of rice based on historical production data.

join_plan.notes: No direct join keys exist between the datasets. However, both datasets contain information about rice, so a manual join based on crop type (rice) and year could be considered.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Impute missing values with mean or median of the respective column.

proposals.validation_plan: Split the data into training (2018-2023) and test (2024) sets. Evaluate using RMSE and MAE.
quality_checks: Verify that the join is performed correctly by checking the number of rows and ensuring no duplicates.
Check for null values in key columns before performing the join.
Ensure that the target variable is not present in the training set to avoid data leakage.

proposals.title: Analyze Trends in Rice Cultivation Area Over Time
proposals.problem_statement: Analyzing trends in the area under rice cultivation over time can provide insights into agricultural practices and policy impacts. This task aims to explore the changes in rice cultivation area across different seasons and years.

join_plan.notes: Both datasets can be joined using the 'Crop' and 'Season' columns.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Impute missing values with the mean of the respective column.

proposals.validation_plan: Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to visualize trends and patterns in the data.
quality_checks: Verify that the join is performed correctly by checking the number of rows and ensuring no duplicates.
Check for null values in key columns before performing the join.

proposals.title: Cluster Crops Based on Yield and Production Patterns
proposals.problem_statement: Clustering crops based on their yield and production patterns can help in identifying groups of crops with similar characteristics. This task aims to segment crops into clusters using unsupervised learning techniques.

join_plan.notes: Single dataset task, no join required.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Impute missing values with the mean of the respective column.

proposals.validation_plan: Evaluate the clustering using silhouette score and visual inspection of cluster centroids.
quality_checks: Check for null values in key columns before performing the analysis.
Ensure that the data is standardized before applying clustering algorithms.
